tools.name: bolta.remember
tools.description: Store a piece of information in your long-term memory. Use this to remember patterns, preferences, or insights across job runs.

value.description: What to remember (store insights, not raw data)

tools.name: bolta.recall
tools.description: Retrieve information from your long-term memory. Use this to recall patterns, preferences, or insights you've stored in previous job runs.

key.description: Memory key to retrieve (e.g., 'best_posting_time', 'top_topics'). If omitted, returns all memories.
